title: manasa guru guha
sahitya:
maanasa guru | guha roopam.. | m, bajare re.. | 



maanasa guru | guha roopam.. | m, bajare re.. | 



maayaa maya | hritaapam | tyajare, re.. |



(maanasa)







anupallavi







maanava jan | manee sampraap | tE satee |



... ||



maanava jan | manee sampraap | tE satee, para |



maatmanee nira | dishayasukam | vrajare, re ||



(maanasa)







caraNam







satvaguNO | paadishaheeta | sadaa shivam |



swaavidyaa | samEdajee | vOdbhavam ||




tatvam tAmasa yudavishwa vaibhavam

tArakEshwaram Ananda bhairavam

madhyama kAlam


natvaa shree gurucaraNam |



hritvaa naama smaraNam |



jitvaa mOhaa varaNam |



matvaa tvadEka charanam || (repeat)
